DOC.brief_summary: To compare the renal protective properties of two currently used anaesthetic techniques - a sevoflurane-remifentanil/sufentanil combination with a propofol-remifentanil/sufentanil combination for anaesthesia in patients undergoing living donor kidney donation/transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: "Volatile Anesthetic Protection Of Renal Transplants: VAPOR-1-trail
DOC.criteria: All patients: Age > 18 years patient refusal BMI< 17, >35 neurological disorder recent use of psychoactive medication, including alcohol. Donorrecipient couples from the ABOincompatible program Altruistic donor
